Title: Murder on the Orient Express
Language: English, French, German, Turkish, Italian, Swedish
Production_Co: EMI Film Distributors, G.W. Films Limited
Cast: Albert Finney, Lauren Bacall, Martin Balsam, Ingrid Bergman, Jacqueline Bisset, Jean-Pierre Cassel, Sean Connery, John Gielgud, Wendy Hiller, Anthony Perkins, Vanessa Redgrave, Rachel Roberts, Richard Widmark, Michael York, Colin Blakely
Plot: In 1935, when his train is stopped by deep snow, detective Hercule Poirot is called on to solve a murder that occurred in his car the night before. Famous detective Hercule Poirot is on the Orient Express, but the train is caught in the snow. When one of the passengers is discovered murdered, Poirot immediately starts investigating. Written by Murray Chapman <muzzle@cs.uq.oz.au>
Keywords: murder, orient express, train journey, whodunit, train
Actors: Albert Finney, Lauren Bacall, Ingrid Bergman
Description: Directed by Sidney Lumet.  With Albert Finney, Lauren Bacall, Ingrid Bergman, Sean Connery. In 1935, when his train is stopped by deep snow, detective Hercule Poirot is called on to solve a murder that occurred in his car the night before.
